metadata.name: Frost Genie
metadata.description: The first installment from the Genesis Genie's collection is a metaphor for my long career as a digital artist and symbolizes my first appearance into the fine art world. Emerging from my shrouded life of production, the piece showcases some of my most valuable skills and abilities. In this seamlessly loop-able piece the audience, for a moment, gets to experience what lives behind the smoke curtains of my life and what is to come.
